element.name: InputFiles
element.description: The set of input files that went into producing this file.

element.name: OutputFiles
element.description: The set of output files that included this file in its input.

element.name: JobId
element.description: The unique identifier generated by the workflow manager for the job that produced this file.

element.name: ProductionDateTime
element.description: The date/time stamp that this file was produced either by ingestion or processing.

element.name: ExecutablePathnames
element.description: The pathnames to the exectuables used to generate this product.

element.name: ExecutableVersions
element.description: The versions of the exectuables used to generate this product.

element.name: ApplicationSuccessFlag
element.description: An indication of whether the generating application completed successfully.

element.name: TaskSuccessFlag
element.description: An indication of whether the PCS Workflow Task that ran the PGE completed successfully.

element.name: JobSuccessFlag
element.description: An indication of whether the PCS job ran by the PCS to create the product completed successfully.

element.name: PGEVersion
element.description: Captures the version of the algorithm that has been run on the data.

element.name: ProcessingNode
element.description: The node that the job that produced this product was run on.

element.name: ExecutionTime
element.description: The amount of time that the job that produced this product took to run.

element.name: CmdLineParameters
element.description: The command line parameters that were used to invoke this job.
